com.miviclin.droidengine2d.audio

Class SoundManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.audio.SoundManager

  • public class SoundManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages sounds and allows playing them.
    All sounds will be loaded in memory.
    Author:
    Miguel Vicente Linares

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SoundManager(int maxStreams, int initialCapacity)
      Creates a SoundManager.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loadSound(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String path)
      Loads a sound from the specified file.
      void playSound(java.lang.String path)
      Plays the specified sound.
      void release()
      Releases all sounds and resources.
      void releaseSound(java.lang.String path)
      Releases a sound that is not going to be used anymore.
      void reset(int maxStreams, int initialCapacity)
      Releases all resources (calls release()) and resets this SoundManager with the specified parameters.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SoundManager

        public SoundManager(int maxStreams,
            int initialCapacity)
        Creates a SoundManager.
        Parameters:
        maxStreams - Max number of sounds that can be played at the same time.
        initialCapacity - Initial capacity of the sound pool. It will be resized if more sounds are loaded after the specified capacity is reached.

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset(int maxStreams,
         int initialCapacity)
        Releases all resources (calls release()) and resets this SoundManager with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        maxStreams - Max number of sounds that can be played at the same time.
        initialCapacity - Initial capacity of the sound pool. It will be resized if more sounds are loaded after the specified capacity is reached.

      • loadSound

        public void loadSound(android.content.Context context,
             java.lang.String path)
        Loads a sound from the specified file. The sound will be stored in memory.
        Parameters:
        context - Context.
        path - File path. Relative to the assets folder.

      • releaseSound

        public void releaseSound(java.lang.String path)
        Releases a sound that is not going to be used anymore.
        Parameters:
        path - File path. Relative to the assets folder. This is the path that was specified when the sound was loaded.

      • release

        public void release()
        Releases all sounds and resources. This method should be called when the SoundManager is not needed anymore.

      • playSound

        public void playSound(java.lang.String path)
        Plays the specified sound.
        The spefied sound must have been previously loaded with loadSound(Context, String).
        Parameters:
        path - File path. Relative to the assets folder. This is the path that was specified when the sound was loaded.
